## getRuleParts() function

Checks for validity of input and returns all the sections of a schema string that are used to match rules in a ruleset

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
declare function getRuleParts(input: string): Array<string> | undefined;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  input | string | A Schema string |

<b>Returns:</b>

Array&lt;string&gt; \| undefined

The sections of a schema string that are used to match rules in a ruleset
